|blank_info = 46-35100 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267448 |website = |footnotes = }} Lake Andes is a city in, and the county seat of, Charles Mix County, South Dakota, United States. The population was 710 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:County seats in South Dakota
